description:
A robot comes from the future to help Keroro be less of a screw-up... but not in the way you`d expect. It`s 623`s final radio show, and Natsumi`s invited! Can she resist the urge to shatter the mystery?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Visitor from the Future / 623, Tragedy of the Radio Star
ケロロ 未来からの訪問者 であります / 623 ラジオスターの悲劇 であります
